Workflow overviewÂ¶

ARC3O simulates brightness temperatures from climate model output. It follows the following workflow.

Note

Please remain aware that the results from ARC3O have only been evaluated for the frequency of 6.9 GHz, vertical polarization at the moment! The use for other frequencies and polarizations is at your own risk!
